Agency: Pennsylvania Department of Banking and Securities
New Jersey Department of Environmental Protection
Info Source: Contained in data received from the agency on October 26, 2020 in response to an open records request. The data was a spreadsheet version of information contained in the records in the DEP DataMiner at https://www13.state.nj.us/DataMiner

Description: Carvana agreed to pay the District Attorney offices of Los Angeles, San Diego, Santa Clara, and Ventura counties $150,000 in civil penalties and $50,000 in costs each, plus a $50,000 restitution payment to a charitable organization to settle allegations it operated in California without a dealer's or transporter's license.
